title: Ned Kelly (VR)
brief_description: Ian MacLarty’s Ned Kelly VR game, made in Vertex Meadow, lets players inhabit the limited view of the famous bushranger’s iconic helmet.

constellations_other.name: Outlawed
constellations_other.description: From The Story of the Kelly Gang to Sweet Country, this Constellation explores bushrangers, samurai and bandits.

description:
Ian MacLarty’s Ned Kelly VR game, made in Vertex Meadow, lets players inhabit the limited view of the famous bushranger’s iconic helmet.

https://ianmaclarty.itch.io/ned-kelly
